channel.title: Hurt Locker Producers launching massive lawsuit
channel.description: Thats right guys/girls tens of thousands of people may be getting hit with subpoenas for illegally downloading "The Hurt Locker" after the producers threw a tantrum because their overhyped movie did poorly. More information here http://thresq.hollywoodreporter.com/2010/05/hurt-locker-producer-to-sue-pirates.html If you ask me this is just a scare tactic and most shouldn't be worried but I've been wrong before ;O.

item.title: Hurt Locker Producers launching massive lawsuit
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:5, topic:340640”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=437010.msg3212043#msg3212043 date=1274336449]
This is awesome, my only hope is that they actually proceed and sue these faggots. If piracy is ever going to stop, someone must make a statement.
[/quote]
Piracy will never stop it didn’t start with the internet you know.[/quote]Truths, but i’m sick of all these fucking kids promoting piracy like it was their fucking legal right to do so. They clearly lack perspective of reality.

Read full topic

item.title: Hurt Locker Producers launching massive lawsuit
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Interesting. Their probably just trying to make more money via settlements since the movie was released 5 months before US released. It’s all an elaborate ‘justified’ way to scam people imo.

According to lawyers at Dunlap’s firm, 75 percent of ISPs have cooperated fully.
Yeah because percentages are always either 25 50 or 75 percent rofl. I call BS.

Read full topic
